name: Aw Heck, WAR!
description:
Your beloved valley homeland is under attack from occupying enemy invaders! Grab a rifle, SMG, or pistol... then grab explosive weapons and destroy their bases to stop the enemies from spawning! But as you fight, the more bases you destroy, the more enemies spawn at remaining bases, so bring plenty of ammo...or if all else fails, use your fists!

Along with the random incoming artillery fire that blankets the battlefield, enemy troops, tanks, helicopters with snipers, and bomber jets are out to kill you.

Find loot crates inside abandoned barns and homes for ammo and equipment. Call in airstrikes with the artillery binoculars, throw timed/impact grenades, or set C4 with a timer or motion activated trip wire!

Getting around is half the fun! Jump in the pickup truck for a spin, or fly the attack helicopter equipped with missiles and a minigun to wreak havoc on ground troops! On foot, players can wave their arms to increase their run speed for a more immersive experience! And, pressing jump while mid air activates the hang glider so you can quickly glide to safety!

As you battle, your carnage will be visible across the battlefield, as dead bodies, rubble, and other debris litter the ground.

Features:
-Arm-Waver sprinting
-Slow-Motion time modes
-Speed-of-sound delay - first you hear the bullet, then hear the shot!
-Interactable VR Weapons and Objects
-Drivable/Flyable vehicles
-Enemy spawning to create your own battle
-Destructible buildings and vehicles
-Lootable weapons and tools
-Fight Multiple Land and air enemies
-Enemy dismemberment and gore
-Hand-to-Hand Combat
-Multiple game modes, including Hunt, Tank Hunt, Heli Hunt, Peaceful, Classic, and Hardcore.
